original_text: The second lot came out for Simeon, for the tribe of the people of Simeon, according to their clans, and their inheritance was in the midst of the inheritance of the people of Judah.
korean_text: 둘째로 시므온 곧 시므온 자손의 지파를 위하여 그들의 가족대로 제비를 뽑았으니 그들의 기업은 유다 자손의 기업 중에서라

sentences.original_text: The second lot came out for Simeon
sentences.korean_translation: 두 번째 제비는 시므온을 위해 뽑혔고

sentences.original_text: for the tribe of the people of Simeon
and their inheritance was in the midst of the inheritance of the people of Judah.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 기업은 유다 자손의 기업 가운데 있었으니
